price: Mu vy’ukuri, ingoro ya mbere yubatswe kw’isi kugira abantu bayisengeremwo Imana Allah, ni ukuri ni ingoro ntagatifu iri i Makka. Iyo ngoro, irahezagiwe n’imigisha myinshi; kuyitumbera mu gusenga, kuyishengerera no kuyigendera, harimwo n’uburongozi ku bantu bose.
arabic: إِنَّ أَوَّلَ بَيۡتٖ وُضِعَ لِلنَّاسِ لَلَّذِي بِبَكَّةَ مُبَارَكٗا وَهُدٗى لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

meta.transliteration: inna awwala baytin wuḍiʿa lilnnāsi lalladhī bibakkata mubārakan wahudan lil'ʿālamīna
